contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 28th day of December, 1995, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby Granted and the matter is Remanded to the trial court for resentencing pursuant to Commonwealth v. Bell, 537 Pa. 558, 645 A.2d 211 (1994).
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Rule of Judicial Administration 701(f).
